entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
